Mashup.description: Duplication of PTC.Scorecard.Scorecard_MU used to change the manager ID passed in to other places in scorecard
Mashup.name: PTCDTS.Scorecard.Scorecard_MU

FieldDefinition.description: Disables zooming in and out within the mashup
FieldDefinition.name: disableZoom

FieldDefinition.description: Open the mashup in full screen mode
FieldDefinition.name: fullScreenMode

FieldDefinition.description: The height of the mashup page
FieldDefinition.name: height

FieldDefinition.description: Use the height of the device display, or a custom height (in px)
FieldDefinition.name: heightType

FieldDefinition.description: The initial zoom scale when the mashup is loaded for the first time
FieldDefinition.name: initialScale

FieldDefinition.description: A title for the mashup shortcut on the iOS home screen
FieldDefinition.name: iosShortcutIconTitle

FieldDefinition.description: The style of the iOS status bar
FieldDefinition.name: iosStatusBarAppearance

FieldDefinition.description: The maximum scale that users can zoom out to
FieldDefinition.name: maximumScale

FieldDefinition.description: The minimum scale that users can zoom out to
FieldDefinition.name: minimumScale

FieldDefinition.description: The width of the mashup page
FieldDefinition.name: width

FieldDefinition.description: Use the width of the device display, or a custom width (in px)
FieldDefinition.name: widthType

DataShape.description: Creates a configuration table for the metrics to be shown/hidden in the Scorecard main page
DataShape.name: PTCDTS.ScorecardImpl.MetricConfiguration

FieldDefinition.name: managerThingName

FieldDefinition.description: unique identifier used to identify the thing or mashup that is being configured
FieldDefinition.name: id

FieldDefinition.description: name of the mashup to configure
FieldDefinition.name: mashupName

ConfigurationTable.description: Configuration table for dynamic menus. Menu Items can be specified here and they will show up for the given menu name.
ConfigurationTable.name: MenuConfiguration

FieldDefinition.description: An optional field to indicate the ordering of the menu items
FieldDefinition.name: menuOrderPreference

FieldDefinition.description: Localization table key for the optional section that groups like menus together
FieldDefinition.name: menuSectionKey

FieldDefinition.description: Localization table key for the menu label
FieldDefinition.name: menuTitleKey

FieldDefinition.description: Localization table key for the menu label.
FieldDefinition.name: menuTitleKey

ConfigurationTable.description: List of metrics to show on the scorecard
ConfigurationTable.name: MetricConfiguration

ConfigurationTable.description: Configuration table for any Things that need to be configured. This allows for OOTB things to be customized, and the new version that should be used can be configured here
ConfigurationTable.name: ThingConfiguration

FieldDefinition.description: unique identifier used to identify the thing or mashup that is being configured
FieldDefinition.name: id

FieldDefinition.description: Name of the Thing entity or Mashup entity that is to be configured
FieldDefinition.name: thingName
